translation: (tvhụ̄ ạsiv ya rsvl Allah panh thi pnnhi khạṭr pran, byyhi thi ạsiyvukh hychhnavan yhi parun kh) pnah chhus mngan ṣbḥ kis mạlks.
Byyhi chhus khṣvṣaan pnah mngan rạcz hnzi tạryky nishhi yylhi so vahravnh yiyhi (rạcz andr chhu shrn hund aḥtmal ẓạhre)
Byyhi chhus khṣvṣaan pnah mngan timn znann nishhi yimh panh gnddn petth phokh divan chhe yʿny sḥr krvnyn znann nishhi. (murad chhe timav andrh lbyd bni aʿṣmh snz kvrih ya ʿām sạḥr znanh)
Byyhi prth ḥsd krvunhi sndi shr nishhi yylhi suh ḥsd kri.
